title: Legal News for Fire Departments: Updates on Property Tax Levies and EMS Regulations
summary: The newsletter discusses legal updates related to property tax levies in fire departments, including limitations imposed by various statutes such as RCW 52.16 and 84.52. It also covers EMS levies, prorationing methods under the Lid laws, and constitutional limits on property taxes.
compressed_content: Discussions on property tax levies and their limitations. Details on EMS levies and their regulatory framework. Exploration of Lid laws and their impact onlevies. Methods for prorationing under constitutional limits. Impact of state statutes on local taxing districts.
